blogPost.title: What do you look for in founders/products in early stage fundraising? Answer by @darrenbechtel, Founder and Managing Director, Brick & Mortar Ventures. https://t.co/4MJuOEooIg https://t.co/KL3O2psWqX
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: アーリーステージの資金調達において、ファウンダー／プロダクトに求めるものは何ですか？Answer by @darrenbechtel, Founder and Managing Director, Brick & Mortar Ventures. https://t.co/4MJuOEooIg https://t.co/KL3O2psWqX
在早期筹款中，你对创始人/产品有什么要求？回答者：@darrenbechtel，Brick & Mortar Ventures的创始人兼总经理。https://t.co/4MJuOEooIg https://t.co/KL3O2psWqX
在早期籌款中，你對創始人/產品有什麼要求？回答者：@darrenbechtel，Brick & Mortar Ventures的創始人兼總經理。https://t.co/4MJuOEooIg https://t.co/KL3O2psWqX

previous.title: How great is Vancouver as filming locations? Answer by @theAlainUy, Actor, Writer, Director. https://t.co/2fsWquVbYK https://t.co/QOEuX0FcQE

localize.full_text: 撮影地としてのバンクーバーの素晴らしさは？Answer by @theAlainUy, Actor, Writer, Director. https://t.co/2fsWquVbYK https://t.co/QOEuX0FcQE
温哥华作为拍摄地点有多好？由 @theAlainUy, 演员，作家，导演 回答。https://t.co/2fsWquVbYK https://t.co/QOEuX0FcQE
溫哥華作爲拍攝地點有多好？由 @theAlainUy, 演員，作家，導演 回答。https://t.co/2fsWquVbYK https://t.co/QOEuX0FcQE

next.title: What are some little-known facts about Netflix? Answer by Mark Randolph, Netflix Co-founder. https://t.co/8fYbZUX2gQ https://t.co/TwXFTEIruH

localize.full_text: Netflix のあまり知られていない事実を教えてください。回答者：マーク・ランドルフ（Netflix共同創業者） https://t.co/8fYbZUX2gQ https://t.co/TwXFTEIruH
关于Netflix有哪些鲜为人知的事实？由Netflix联合创始人Mark Randolph回答。https://t.co/8fYbZUX2gQ https://t.co/TwXFTEIruH
關於Netflix有哪些鮮爲人知的事實？由Netflix聯合創始人Mark Randolph回答。https://t.co/8fYbZUX2gQ https://t.co/TwXFTEIruH
